headline: Pheton Holdings Ltd Issues Statements Addressing Recent Market Activity and Misleading Rumors
summary: BEIJING, China, Aug. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pheton Holdings Ltd (the “Company,” “we,” “our” or “Pheton”), a healthcare solution provider specializing in treatment planning systems for brachytherapy and other related products and services, today issued the following statements in response to recent market volatility and a third-party publication that has raised questions and concerns among shareholders.
